Summary: The monogsh has the limitations and quirks of node console.log
Description:
h3. *Problem Statement/Rationale*
Cursors are automatically transformed into arrays.
Console.log depth for objects and arrays is similar to nodejs / javascript console.log

 
h3. *Steps to Reproduce*

run mongosh,
Try to display a high depth dataset
h3. *Expected Results*
to work like .pretty() or findOne from mongo client.
h3. *Actual Results*
Doesn't work like .pretty / findOne but like console.log
Creator: Valentin Popescu
